title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 402.22 - Licensee's return of unused debtor funds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 402.22 - Licensee's return of unused debtor funds

State Regulations

The licensee must demonstrate a "good faith effort" to
locate and refund any monies to the debtor that, for whatever reason, cannot be
sent to a creditor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
402.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
